content: a rainbow of fun puffy flowers is used to create this super adorable crochet clutch featured in red heart super saver super craft kit individual blossoms are made and sewn together following easy-to-read diagrams in the pattern then a fabric liner and zipper are inserted to create a tidy and useful clutch you ll do chain single_crochet double_crochet puff clusters and more it s a cute gift for kids materials red heart® super saver® super craft kit - 1 kit kit includes 12 balls 50 g/1 7 oz each 600 g/21 oz total yardage 85 m/93 yds each 1020 m/1116 yds total gauge motif = 2½ 6 cm diameter measurements approx 9 23 cm wide x 7½ 19 cm long
